# Welcome to the McPherson Group

The McPherson Group is a research laboratory focused on advancing knowledge through innovative research and collaboration.

## Research Focus

Our group conducts cutting-edge research in:

- Data science and computational methods
- Statistical modeling and analysis
- Interdisciplinary research collaborations
- Open science and reproducible research

## News & Updates

Stay tuned for updates on our latest research findings, publications, and group activities.
